creditline: Gift of E. Carl Douglas and family in celebration of the 100th anniversary of the Minneapolis Institute of Art
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: rounded ovoid top with hanging chain, with conical bell with clapper below; dark brown-black hair and feathers around sides and back of bell; entire piece, including hair, encrusted with brown accretions overall
medium: Metal, animal hair, feathers, other materials
title: Boli power object
